pages.text: On [$(k:use)], the $(item)Sigil of Flowing Blood$() pulls $(blood)LP$() directly from a player soul network to spawn a block of $(blood)Life Essence$() into the world.$(br2)While the extraction process is far from efficient, it is much faster than collecting blood from an altar one bucket at a time.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)2500 LP$()/use
